availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert A. Kidd (Livingston County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary C. Brice Kidd in Crittenden County, Kentucky, on October 23, 1848. Father of Robert B. Kidd, John Kidd, and Nannie Kidd. Farmer in Crittenden County in 1850. Farmer in Livingston County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, District 1, p. 217A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Division 2, p. 228.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Crittenden County Marriages, Film 000558428, p. 45.
